import './index.css' const PasswordList = props => { const {eachItem, onDeletinguserList} = props const {id, websiteName, userName, password} = eachItem const firstLetter = userName[0].toUpperCase() const onClickdeleteBtn = () => { onDeletinguserList(id) } return (
  • {firstLetter}

    {websiteName}

    {userName}

    {password}

    • ) } export default PasswordList
